https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/j5Yx85fxsdN0p0CSkH3cTnqE5dr.jpg "The nocturnal animal life in the dark ... There you go. Here is what put the flea in my ear or rather the flea in the eye ... In almost absolute darkness, I film what I do not see, I am guided and, carried because I hear ... I FILM - I FLY - I PLAY ..." -Michel Nedjar, 23 Nov 2003 Black Room Revealed
